title: Milky Way Summer
description: 17-year-old Evan Langston hides her struggles beneath long sleeves and jeans. When her cuts are discovered she is offered the chance to escape her life- even if it is just for the summer. Far from home on a Texas cattle ranch, Evan is determined to hide her past and start new, but there’s a problem... Evan doesn’t expect to feel love and acceptance from her new family. She doesn’t expect to fall in love with a cow. She doesn’t expect Jackson Finely. Suddenly she feels the carefully placed walls around her heart come crashing down, but in order to let someone in she is forced to face her past head on.
author: Sarah Toney
